articles.content: The Brisbane Heat have been locked out of Victoria, forcing their KFC BBL match against the Melbourne Renegades on Thursday to be shifted to Canberra and played in an empty stadium, while all matches… [+6100 chars]

articles.title: Wellington Phoenix receive apology for red card; waiting to hear on ban for Alex Rufer - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Referees' boss acknowledges they got it wrong but the Wellington Phoenix could still be without Alex Rufer for at least their next match.
articles.content: The Wellington Phoenix have received an apology for the video assistant refereeintervention that led to a red card for Alex Rufer in their 1-1 draw with Macarthur FC, but are waiting to see how long … [+4269 chars]

articles.author: Dan Walsh
articles.title: Maroons fullback Allan joins Bulldogs on three-year deal - NRL.COM
articles.description: Canterbury have signed Maroons fullback Corey Allan on a three-year deal following his release from South Sydney.
articles.content:
Corey Allan is officially a Bulldog after cashing in on his Queensland Origin debut and rapid NRL rise with a three-year deal at Belmore.
